price: 68. Ee ah kuwa aan baryin (caabudin) ilaah kale la jirka Alle, oo aan ku dilin nafta uu Alle xarrimay waxaan ahayn xaq, oo aan zineyzan (dhilleysan), qofkii falana waxaa, wuxuu la kulmi eedsiin denbiguu galay ah.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدۡعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yadʿūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara walā yaqtulūna al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama al-lahu illā bil-ḥaqi walā yaznūna waman yafʿal dhālika yalqa athāman
